This week we invite directors to consider how their business might fare if their cyber insurer declined to pay a significant claim, plus relevant news including the latest victims of the MoveIt vulnerability, a delay to SEC cybersecurity regulations and how one CEO opted for the personal touch in communications after his company was hit with ransomware.
